definition: scientific name/Latin name (of plant or animal)/(according to an old system of nomenclature) on entering school life, a formal personal name given to new students
name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people

sentences.english: Not very young, the hope that they can learn more teachers, more personal style.
sentences.chinese: 不太年輕時候，希望自己能多學名師，多些個人風格。

sentences.english: The three kinds of the idea contradictions and their growing relationship with famous literary works.
sentences.chinese: 思想矛盾的三種類型及其與文學名著的伴生關係。

sentences.english: A scientific name of a taxon at the rank of subgenus.
sentences.chinese: 即一個亞屬級分類單元的學名。

sentences.english: The rain is driving in from the west.
The official name for the Adam's apple is the prominentia laryngea.
It represents the plane of the solar system, with the official name of "the ecliptic."
sentences.chinese: 這代表太陽系平面，學名“黃道”。

sentences.english: I also use it as literature.
I give the Latin on account of the savoriness of the trivial name.
sentences.chinese: 我把它的拉丁文的學名寫下是因爲它的俗名不很好。

sentences.english: As we all know, GuoYu is a masterpiece of biographically historic literature about Pre-Qin period.
sentences.chinese: 《國語》是先秦時期一部史傳文學名著。

sentences.english: The scientific name is Porsign ( porcine) reproductive and respiratory semdron (respiratory syndrome).
sentences.chinese: 此病學名是豬的繁殖和呼吸綜合症。

sentences.english: They have no scientific name and live behind a single rock in a cave off Chichi-shima island.
sentences.chinese: 它們生活在集集島外一個洞的單巖後面，沒有學名。

sentences.english: The common name for the ingredient is listed first, followed by the Latin, or scientific name.
sentences.chinese: 一些成份的常用名先列出，然後是拉丁文名稱或學名。

sentences.english: Dickens'; A Tale of Two Cities is a literary classic.
sentences.chinese: 狄更斯的《雙城記》是一部文學名著。

sentences.english: Rex Rabbit, scientific name Rex Rabbit, is a type of fur-rabbit.
sentences.chinese: 獺兔，學名力克斯兔，是一種典型的皮毛用型兔子。

sentences.english: Someone said the lake monster is a kind of giant red fish, called Hucho taimen.
sentences.chinese: 有人說這湖怪是一種學名叫哲羅鮭的大紅魚。

definition: grouper (Portuguese: garoupa)/also called 鮨/Epinephelinae (subfamily of Serranidae, fish family including grouper)
